00059                 public static function is_method($method)
00060                 {
00061                         return !strncmp($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'], $method, strlen($method));
00062                 }

00071                 {
00072                         return $_REQUEST[$name];

00080                 protected static function purge_querystring()
00081                 {
00082                         $pairs = explode('&', $_SERVER['QUERY_STRING']);
00083                         $newpairs = array();
00084                         foreach ($pairs as $pair)
00085                         {
00086                                 if (!empty($pair))
00087                                 {
00088                                         @list($key, $value) = explode('=', $pair);
00089                                         if (in_array($key, array('action', 'controller', 'id')))
00090                                         {
00091                                                 continue;
00092                                         }
00093                                         $newpairs[] = $pair;
00094                                 }
00095                         }
00096                         return implode('&', $newpairs);
00097                 }
00098         }
